column5: Next year we're heading up to Ear Falls on a Sunday. In the past, we stopped at Dutchie's for a "introductory" 6-pack of 'Batts and finished it across the road. Question: Is Dutchie's open on Sundays in the summer and can they sell beer on Sunday's?

I can't help on whether Dutchie's is open on Sunday, but here is a link to The Beer Store where you can check hours by location http://www.thebeerstore.ca/default.asp. When we crossed on Sunday this year the Fort Frances LCBO did not open until noon and most of the LCBO's further north were closed all day. That said, I am getting to know more about The Beer Store.
Dutchies opens at 8AM seven days a week during the summer. I'm not sure on the Sunday beer sales question.
Dutchie's does sell beer / liquor on Sundays.

We stopped at Dutchies on the way north on a Canadian Holiday and they were open. Also, Rickie, went out of her way to help us when VISA suddenly decided that we were being scammed by a fraudulent charge in another country!!! 7 long distance calls on her dime. good people ........do business with them. MJ Shelton
